Description: DescriptionThe Starfish is a casual sport watch with an easy to read dial and a laid back look. The watch comes at a great size, about 42mm wide and 12mm thick. It has great presence on the wrist, but is thin enough to be tucked under the cuff. There is an exhibition case back and behind the tinted crystal is the famous 46943 caliber movement. The bezel is brushed like the rest of the case. The Starfish comes with a well-made leather band that serves to dress the watch up and is perfect for everyday wear.Men / Women:MenPower Reserve:Approximately 40 hoursCrystal:MineralMovement:ORIENT Cal. 46943 Automatic Mov’tClasp:BuckleWater Resistance:50mCase Material:Stainless SteelCase Diameter:42mm without crownCase Thickness:12mmDial Color:BlackBezel Material:Stainless SteelBezel Function:UnidirectionalCalendar:Day/DateBand Material:Leather (Black)Lug Width:22mmWarranty Type:1 Year Orient Watch Warranty Shipping:Shipping via Registered Airmail Service is free everywhere. We will ship your watch via registered airmail service which comes with a tracking number. Please allow 1-3 business days for shipping (although we will try to ship within 1 working day where possible). Shipment to all major cities takes between 8-14 working days, depending on the city, but is usually sooner. If you need your watch to be shipped via a faster service, please drop us a note and we will provide a quote for EMS service. We are not responsible for customs or clearance in your country or any tax associated. Please let us know at the point of purchase if you would like us to state anything specific in the customs declaration form. All our watches come with battery installed, however, when we ship your watch we state that the battery is not included. This is for customs purpose. Warranty/Packaging/Returns:All our watches are 100% genuine and come with a standard 1 year international warranty by Orient and your watch will come in the original Orient box. We offer 100% full refund if the item you purchased is grossly different from what was described. Please ask any questions if in doubt before purchasing.We will take photos of the watch prior to shipping it and send you the images.
Title: Orient Starfish FEM7J001B9 EM7J001B9 Black Dial Black Leather Band Men's Watch
